title: Input tags are broken on first load of page
content:
I am a developer of AIO Tests, its a test management app that runs inside Jira.

We have been encountering a problem with input tags in our app when running on Firefox for some time now, has even been reported by a few customers now.

When we click on a link for our app, and it opens in a new tab, the users are unable to click or type inside the input area unless they do any of the following:

  • Bulleted list item Go to a different tab and come back
  • Bulleted list item Open the developer options and then click on the input bar again
  • Bulleted list item Lose focus of firefox app itself, and come back.

At which point the problem fixes itself.

We have been able to consistently reproduce this problem, this is a firefox only issue, we tested in Chrome and Safari, but unable to recreate it over there.

Is this a known issue? Is there any known fix for this that we can implement from our end?

issue submitted to bugzilla: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1857865
creator: sidagarwal14799

title: translator button is not available
content: upgraded to the latest version today, firefox shows that translator function is now available, try now, I clicked the link to the french page and nothing, there is no translate button in the address bar, nor in the 3 dashes menu.
creator: igs1000

title: Firefox no longer can handle secure websites (spontaneous failure).
content:
I was listening to Pandorda and the music spontaneously stopped. The following message was displayed:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to www.pandora.com. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

Error code: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

As a test, I switched over to Chrome and it is fully operational. I prefer to use Firefox, but it now rejects all secure websites. Help, please.

Thank you, Ron Kinder
creator: k7vmn

title: Bulk remove connected firefox services
content: My job resets my Firefox every day, so i need to sign in each day anew. In the connected services accounts, [https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/fxa-managing-device#w_i-see-duplicat...] many stale logins are preserved. Is it possible to batch delete the connections? For example with a checkbox? Deleteing them one by one is a hassle.
creator: eiland

title: O navegador não funciona direito.
content: Olá, boa noite. Comprei meu notebook faz 2/3 meses, usava o navegador padrão (bing) mas preferi trocar pro Mozilla. Tenho mais familiaridade com esse, porém, ultimamente vem apresentando alguns problemas: Trava TUDO, o youtube não abre, o cursor do mouse não funciona na página, pra usar rede social fica muito complicado também. Gosto muito desse navegador e não quero trocar, se puderem, por gentileza, me dar uma solução, ficaria muito grata! Muito obrigada pela atenção, aguardo a resposta.

title: Firefox crashed.
content:
My Firefox Browser keeps "crashing" or freezing up. My computer stops working and the apps don't work. Nothing responds. when I restart it only takes a minute or 2 till it happens again. this began slowly 2-3 weeks ago but now it is daily. Every time I turn on my computer.

For the 1st time, today I got a message box titled Mozilla Crash Reporter: Firefox had a problem and crashed. Tell Mozilla so they can fix it. I did run a McAfee computer scan but this didn't help. I'm really surprised I was able to complete and send you this message.

TY,
creator: frodosonofdrogo62

title: Why does Copy Image make HEAD request to server and how to prevent it?
content:
Hi!

When I open Tools > Browser Tools > Browser Toolbox (Ctrl + Alt + Shift + I) and then go to Network tab then I see browser requests. When I right click image and then choose Copy Image it makes HEAD request to server. And then based on that result seems decide how to copy this image. For example if server responds with 403 to this head request I can still paste copied image to MS paint for example. But I can not paste such images to websites. Such as Yandex reverse image search for example.

Why does firefox behave like that and how to disable it?

To investigate the issue her is a sample clipboard event handler that can take image from clipboard: https://pastebin.com/KNKfPGcy

If HEAD request gets 403 response then this clipboard code will cause the following to be posted instead of image: <Error>AccessDenied<Message>Access Denied</Message><RequestId>6HRMZAKJPFCNZ6QS</RequestId><HostId>ANuZElpxuSerm5iGttCRay/SCAaDuc3Qv1WPxJGHQRJqsGISjyxxG68EFtw9xHDdgnmqtuAZqsg=</HostId></Error>

This situation can happen for example when I open image on new tab and then the server removes image or link gets expired and then I want to copy this image. It causes annoyance where when I want to paste it to some other web site I first have to paste it in MS Paint and then select all and copy in MS paint to finally get image that I can freely paste everywhere.

Seems like this is some deliberately made user hostile behavior in Firefox. How can I disable it? And besides, isn't it a privacy concern when every time I click Copy Image server is notified? I mean someone else should not know that I am about to copy their image.
creator: wybqogzigoxruxdhnp

title: Hide Bookmarks bar shortcuts text.
content:
there used to be an add on called roomy bookmarks that stopped working so people found ways around to replicate it and it works on win 10 but I just switched to Win 11 and this solution doesnt seem to work anymore for me, anyone know if i need to change anything? 

    Locate your firefox profile folder, in this article they say where you can find it: http://kb.mozillazine.org/Profile_folder    Find your profile folder mine was: C:\Users\***\AppData\Roaming\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\***.default\    Locate a folder called chrome (if it doesn't exists create one through your O.S) must be lowercase    Locate inside chrome folder the file: userChrome.css (if it doesn't exists create one through your O.S, google how to create a .css file on notepad) Chrome must be cased as shown above    Add the code: https://pastebin.com/1r6cc8hW    Restart Firefox, now you are done, if you don't want text to be displayed within the icons just remove the last line.

This is the line of code i have in css file that works for me in my win 10 machine.

/* 

* Recreates the basic functionality of the popular Roomy Bookmarks Toolbar add-on in Firefox 57+. * Uncomment the section with the functionality that you want, leave all other sections commented. * This only affects toplevel toolbar bookmarks and folders, bookmarks and subfolders in folders are unaffected. * The tooltips on long hover (showing bookmark name and link) are unaffected. */ 
/* some margin settings, do not comment out */

.bookmark-item > .toolbarbutton-text { 

 margin-top: -1px !important;

} .bookmark-item { 

 margin: -1px !important;

}


/* No text on toolbar bookmarks; Text on bookmark folders. No hover effect. */

  1. PlacesToolbarItems > .bookmark-item:not([container]):not([open="true"]) > .toolbarbutton-text { 
 display: none !important;

}

  1. PlacesToolbarItems > .bookmark-item:not([container]):not([open="true"]) > .toolbarbutton-icon[label]:not([label=""]) { 
 margin-inline-end: 0px !important;

}


/* No text on toolbar bookmarks; No text on bookmark folders. Show bookmark text on hover. */ /*

  1. PlacesToolbarItems > .bookmark-item:not(:hover):not([open="true"]) > .toolbarbutton-text { 
 display: none !important;

}

  1. PlacesToolbarItems > .bookmark-item:not(:hover):not([open="true"]) > .toolbarbutton-icon[label]:not([label=""]) { 
 margin-inline-end: 0px !important;

}

  • /


/* No text on toolbar bookmarks; Text on bookmark folders. Show bookmark text on hover. */ /*

  1. PlacesToolbarItems > .bookmark-item:not(:hover):not([container]):not([open="true"]) > .toolbarbutton-text { 
 display: none !important;

}

  1. PlacesToolbarItems > .bookmark-item:not(:hover):not([container]):not([open="true"]) > .toolbarbutton-icon[label]:not([label=""]) { 
 margin-inline-end: 0px !important;

}

  • /

does anyone have a workaround or a similar add on? i would like to have my booksmarks as shown in the screenshot on my win 11 pc as well.
creator: meromex_102
